TopicTitle: How do we get a [Music] tag?

Articles.Content:
Just now, on the first two pages in KSP Fan Works, there are four music threads. (Disclaimer: one of them is mine.) There have been plenty of others, and we have regular music producers.

I think this justifies having a [Music] tag. How do we get one?

Write to your favorite admin or moderator. While you are at it, ask for a [AAR] tag too.

Good luck.

I vote for a [Music] sub forum

(though that may decrease views, since I don't actually read the mission report sub forum that often, even though there is lots of interesting stuff in there.
